feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
